import React ,{ Component } from 'react'; class Forms extends Component{ constructor (){ super() this.state = { firstName:"", lastName:"", email:"", password:"", checked:true, isFriendly:true, gender:"", favColor:"blue" } this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this) } handleChange(event){ const {name,value,type,checked} = event.target type === "checkbox" ? this.setState({ [name] : checked }): this.setState({ [name]:value}) } render(){ return(



{this.state.firstName} {this.state.lastName}{this.state.password}
